slides.content: HTML represents the structure of a web page. It uses 'tags' to define elements like headings, paragraphs, links, and images.
An HTML element is defined by a start tag, some content, and an end tag.
Links allow users to navigate between pages, and images make your site visual.
Tables are used to display data in a grid format (rows and columns).
